game.name: My Little Pony Winter Fashion 1
game.description:
If you good fashion sense, you will have plenty of ways to get noticed among people around. Today we have brought to you a brand new dressing game for girls where you can take your sense for fashion to a completely new level. Common friends, winter has just come and the two cute and lovely ponies named Fluttershy and Rainbow Dash are ready to enjoy their holidays of the season! Will you be able to help them get dressed perfectly before leaving their home? Join My Little Pony Winter Fashion 1 game and be prepared to help them find a perfect outfit!
These ponies love playing outside in the snow season and making a snowman. Remember winter comes with some chilled waves of air, so try to choose their outfits accordingly. There are plenty of options, including coats, scarves, gloves and hats to choose from. Your objective in this one of the best girls games is to help ponies enjoy the winter fashion. It is getting difficult for them to wait anymore and start snowing. 
Carrying warm clothes will allow ponies to enjoy in the snow perfectly in this html5 animal dress up game! It will be up to you how to prep up the cute ponies for the winter season. You will have to play the role of a fashion designer here. Put your designer skills to test to create the perfect outfits for the popular My Little Pony characters! Once you design the outfit for the one character, get ready to do the same for the second one. Good luck to browse more fashion games for free to play online, no download required!
